displayName.japanese: 撮るなと言っただろうが！

description.english: Didn't you sign the NDA?
description.german: Hast du die Geheimhaltungsvereinbarung nicht unterschrieben?
description.french: Et l’accord de confidentialité, hein ?
description.italian: Non hai firmato l'accordo di riservatezza?
description.spanish: ¿No has firmado el contrato de confidencialidad?
description.russian: Вы же подписывали соглашение о неразглашении?
description.japanese: 機密保持契約にサインしなかったのか？
description.brazilian: Não assinou o termo de confidencialidade?

displayName.german: Jetzt spielst du wirklich mit der Macht!
displayName.brazilian: Agora o poder está em suas mãos!

description.english: Be careful with those photon connectors!
description.german: Vorsicht mit den Photonenkonnektoren.
description.french: Attention aux connecteurs photoniques.
description.italian: Sta' attento con quei connettori fotonici.
description.spanish: Cuidado con esos conectores de fotones.
description.japanese: フォトン・コネクタには気をつけるんだ
description.brazilian: Cuidado com os conectores de fótons

description.english: Sometimes it's good to vent a bit.
description.german: Manchmal ist es gut, etwas Dampf abzulassen.
description.french: Faites attention au piège des cristaux.
description.italian: A volte fa bene sfogarsi un po'.
description.spanish: A veces va bien ventilar la habitación.
description.schinese: 偶尔吹吹风也是不错的。
description.japanese: ときには発散することも必要だ
description.brazilian: Às vezes é bom dar uma arejada.

displayName.english: Say hello to my little friend
displayName.german: Sag hallo zu meinem kleinen Freund
displayName.schinese: 跟我的小友打声招呼吧
displayName.japanese: 小さな友を紹介しよう
displayName.brazilian: Diga olá para o meu amiguinho

description.english: Take good care of that lamp!
description.german: Pass gut auf die Lampe auf!
description.french: Prenez bien soin de cette lampe !
description.italian: Abbi cura di quella lampada!
description.japanese: ランプの手入れを忘れずに！

description.english: Saving humanity.
description.german: Wir retten die Menschheit.
description.french: Sauver l’humanité.
description.italian: Salvando l'umanità.
description.japanese: 人類を救うんだ

description.english: Hey, don't kick that!
description.german: He, treten verboten!
description.french: Hé, bas les pattes !
description.italian: Ehi, non prenderlo a calci!
description.japanese: おい 蹴るんじゃない！

description.english: Faster than light.
description.german: Schneller als das Licht.
description.french: Plus rapide que la lumière.
description.italian: Più veloce della luce.
description.japanese: 光より速く

description.english: 1095.3 burgers were consumed during this production.
description.german: Bei dieser Produktion wurden 1.095,3 Burger konsumiert.
description.french: 1095,3 burgers ont été nécessaires à cette production.
description.italian: Durante questa produzione sono stati consumati 1095,3 hamburger.
description.spanish: Se consumieron 1095,3 hamburguesas durante esta producción.
description.schinese: 生产过程中消耗了1095.3个汉堡。
description.russian: Во время производства было съедено 1095,3 бургера.
description.japanese: この生産中に1095.3個のバーガーが消費されました
description.brazilian: 1.095,3 hambúrgueres foram ingeridos durante essa produção.

description.english: Someone seems to be addicted.
description.german: Da scheint ja jemand richtig süchtig zu sein.
description.french: Vous ne seriez pas un peu accro ?
description.italian: Sembra che qualcuno abbia una dipendenza.
description.spanish: Parece que alguien se ha enganchado.
description.japanese: 誰かさんが夢中みたいだ

description.english: Hey, Who Turned Out The Lights?
description.german: He, wer hat das Licht ausgemacht?
description.french: Hé, qui a éteint la lumière ?
description.italian: Ehi, chi ha spento le luci?
description.japanese: おい ライトを消したのは誰だ？

description.english: You can have your cake AND eat it!
description.german: Du kannst den Spatz in der Hand UND die Taube auf dem Dach haben!
description.french: Le gâteau au beurre et l’argent du gâteau au beurre !
description.italian: Puoi avere la botte piena E la moglie ubriaca!
description.spanish: ¡Muerdes más de lo que puedes tragar!
description.japanese: ケーキを手に入れて そして食べてもいい！
description.brazilian: Esse bolo, sim, é de dar gosto!

description.english: Do you need a break?
description.german: Brauchst du eine Pause?
description.french: Besoin d’une petite pause ?
description.italian: Ti serve una pausa?
description.japanese: 休憩するかい？

description.english: I like cats.
description.german: Ich mag Katzen.
description.french: J’aime les chats.
description.italian: Mi piacciono i gatti.
description.japanese: 私は猫が好きだ

description.english: Where are you going?
description.german: Wo gehst du hin?
description.french: Où allez-vous comme ça ?
description.italian: Dove vai?
description.japanese: どこにいくんだ？

description.english: Remember to sign it once you get out.
description.german: Vergiss nicht, zu unterschreiben, sobald du draußen bist.
description.french: N’oubliez pas de signer en sortant.
description.italian: Ricordati di firmarlo quando esci.
description.russian: Не забудьте поставить подпись, как выберетесь.
description.japanese: 外に出たら署名するのを忘れずに

description.english: You pushed the button too hard.
description.german: Du hast zu stark auf den Knopf gedrückt.
description.french: Vous avez appuyé trop fort sur le bouton.
description.italian: Hai premuto troppo forte il pulsante.
description.spanish: Has pulsado el botón demasiado fuerte.
description.schinese: 你按按钮时用力过大了。
description.russian: Вы слишком сильно нажали на кнопку.
description.japanese: ボタンを強く押し過ぎだ
description.brazilian: Você apertou o botão com muita força.

displayName.english: See you on the other side!
displayName.german: See you on the other side!
displayName.french: See you on the other side!
displayName.italian: See you on the other side!
displayName.spanish: See you on the other side!
displayName.schinese: See you on the other side!
displayName.russian: See you on the other side!
displayName.japanese: See you on the other side!
displayName.brazilian: See you on the other side!

description.english: You saw it through to the very end.
description.german: Du hast es bis zum Ende durchgezogen.
description.french: Vous êtes allé jusqu’au bout du bout.
description.italian: Sei riuscito a giungere alla fine.
description.japanese: 最後まで見届けたな
description.brazilian: Você chegou até o finalzão de tudo.

displayName.japanese: シュレンディンガーの猫

description.english: Quantum superposition at the push of a button.
description.german: Quantenüberlagerung auf Knopfdruck.
description.french: La superposition quantique au bout du doigt.
description.italian: Sovrapposizione quantistica a portata di pulsante.
description.spanish: Superposición cuántica con solo pulsar un botón.
description.schinese: 按下按钮便会实现量子叠加。
description.japanese: ボタンを押せば量子重ね合わせ状態になる
description.brazilian: Superposição quântica ao alcance de um botão.

description.english: I heard that tool is quite a hit.
description.german: Ich habe gehört, dieses Tool soll echt der Hit sein.
description.french: Il paraît que cet attaché-case est un vrai casse-tête.
description.italian: Ho saputo che quello strumento ha molto successo.
description.spanish: Tengo entendido que esa herramienta va de muerte.
description.japanese: そのツールは人気だと聞いた
description.brazilian: Uma pasta do jeito que Agente gosta.

description.english: Big Brother is watching you.
description.german: Achtung, wir sehen dich.
description.french: Big Brother vous regarde.
description.italian: Il Grande Fratello ti guarda.
description.japanese: ビッグ・ブラザーが見ている

description.english: You crossed paths with that four-legged fluff ball.
description.german: Du bist dem vierbeinigen Wollknäuel über den Weg gelaufen.
description.french: Vous avez croisé la boule de poils.
description.italian: Hai incontrato quella palla di pelo a quattro zampe.
description.spanish: Te has cruzado con esa bola de pelo de cuatro patas.
description.schinese: 你遇到了那只四条腿的毛毛球。
description.japanese: あの4本足の毛玉と出会ったのか
description.brazilian: Você cruzou o caminho daquela bolinha de pelos.

displayName.italian: Servizi per la qualità della vita
displayName.japanese: クオリティ・オブ・ライフ・サービス

description.english: Thank you.
description.german: Ich danke dir.
description.french: Merci.
description.italian: Grazie.
description.japanese: ありがとう

description.english: The human body can survive 21 days without food.
description.german: Ein menschlicher Körper kann 21 Tage ohne Nahrung überleben.
description.french: Le corps humain peut survivre vingt et un jours sans manger.
description.italian: Il corpo umano può resistere 21 giorni senza cibo.
description.spanish: El cuerpo humano puede sobrevivir 21 días sin comida.
description.schinese: 人不吃东西也能活上21天。
description.russian: Организм человека способен 21 день обходиться без пищи.
description.japanese: 人間は21日間何も食べずに生きてける
description.brazilian: O corpo humano é capaz de sobreviver 21 dias sem comida.
